channel.title: Open Source Contributions on Luke Brewerton
channel.description: Recent content in Open Source Contributions on Luke Brewerton

item.title: UI Avatars
item.description: Added a Dockerfile for the application so it can run on Docker.

item.title: Added Docker Build Status Badge to shields.io
item.description: Shields.io is a massive library of badges that can be inserted into project README’s or websites displaying various statuses (code coverage, health, version, etc).Â Support for docker was missing the current build health, and was a pretty trivial addition.

item.title: Schema.org Structured Data documentation fixes
item.description: While adding Structured Data to a client’s website I found some example JSON that was invalid. Simple contribution to cleanup the user documentation providing syntactically valid JSON documents.
